title: GridView multiple selection using mouse rectangle selection
body: UWP's Gridview has only Single/Extended/Multiple selection methods. There is no selection method by mouse rectangle selection, like we select in windows explorer.  i.e. click-drag to draw a rectangle to select multiple GridView items, using mouse.
